title: Understanding the Power Rule
text: The power of a product rule states that $${ab}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ * $$b^n$$. This means you apply the exponent to both factors inside the brackets.

title: Identify the Base and the Exponent
text: In the expression $${\left(2t\right)}^{15}$$, the base is $$2t$$ and the exponent is $$15$$. Apply the power to each part of the base.

title: Applying the Exponent to $$t$$
text: Remember, each part of the product (2t) must be raised to the power of $$15$$, so $$t$$ should also be treated in the same way: $$t^{15}$$.

title: Combine Like Terms
text: Combine the results to form the final simplified expression with positive exponents.
